name: Crystal Cave (itch) (imtiazkhaled)
description:
This game was for my first game jam and my first actual game. Me and my girlfriend both Computer Science majors in college decided it would be pretty fun to make something and take part in a game jam.

And thus you have CrystalCavern, a rouguelike, top-down shooter. It features a procedurally generated map, and randomly spawning enemies to add a bit of spice. This was also my first time making any kind of music, so that was fun too. Hope you like the game. :)
